name: Theory of Surplus Labor (or something like that...)
name_original: Theory of Surplus Labor (or something like that...)
description:
A and D to rotate camera.

Click on the player to throw yourself at the wall.

Space to mute music, R to restart level There is an easter egg if you fall underneath in the center.

A prototype of a game made with the intention of explaining the Theory of Surplus Value and other economic concepts.
